meanings.definition: The quality of being able to be adjusted.
meanings.sent1: The chair's adjustability made it easy to find the perfect height.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the adjustability of my new watch band.
meanings.sent3: The robot's adjustability to dance moves was quite entertaining.
meanings.sent4: Her adjustability in handling stress is like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: The adjustability of the telescope allowed for precise stargazing.

meanings.definition: The ability to change or adapt to different conditions or circumstances.
meanings.sent1: The adjustability of the team's strategy led to their success.
meanings.sent2: His adjustability in different job roles impressed the manager.
meanings.sent3: The adjustability of the weather forecast was surprisingly accurate.
meanings.sent4: The adjustability of a chameleon's skin color is fascinating.
meanings.sent5: The adjustability of the car's suspension made the ride smooth.
